node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `approves` ( `approves_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `user_approves` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `whenapproves` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `action` varchar(4) NOT NULL default '', `section_id` int(11) default NULL, KEY `node` (`approves_id`,`whenapproves`), KEY `user` (`user_approves`,`whenapproves`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: approves
